originalText.text: As a professional photographer and working constantly with top wedding planners in the industry, Assetou is one of my favorite to work with. She is detailed oriented, and execute everything at the highest level. The amount of time and effort that she puts into each and every event is remarkable as she has the ability to make a wedding feel personal, always. She truly cares and brings comfort to the process of wedding planning. She always has the most beautiful smile on and carries her energy with calm and happiness. She radiates sunshine!

originalText.text:
As a Makeup Artist to many of Assetou's Brides, I cannot speak highly enough about Assetou herself and her incredible work.  I have known and worked consistently with Assetou over the last 7 years.
The most beautiful, kind, caring and above all, organised Planner you could ever hope to meet. I trust Assetou and her work so much that I have recommended her to many of my own personal friends who have used her to help organise their weddings. Not one of them was disappointed.
Assetou is amazing, friendly, prompt and above all a master at what she does.
Lucy Flint
CEO, Make Up Artist & Hair Stylist
Miss Harlequin Makeup & Hair NYC

originalText.text: I have worked with many planners over my last 12 years as a wedding photographer in NYC and Assetou is my absolute favorite. Every wedding has gone exactly to plan. She thinks of everything and is exceptionally organized. Best of all though is who she is as a person. She's wonderful. There is no better person to have with you to make your day run smoothly, keep you calm, and make you day even more joyful than it would have been otherwise. There is no one I would recommend more.

originalText.text:
Assetou est un véritable chef d'orchestre
De l'organisation à la réalisation, tout a été parfaitement orchestré pour la demande.
Une préparation 6 mois à l'avance pour une demande en mariage en juillet 2019, sans aucun accro
Toujours disponible pour répondre aux moindres interrogations, elle a permis de rendre ce jour encore plus inoubliable
Nous ne la remercierons jamais assez

text.text:
Assetou is a true conductor
From organization to execution, everything was perfectly orchestrated for the request.
Preparation 6 months in advance for a marriage proposal in July 2019, without any hassle
Always available to answer the slightest questions, she helped make this day even more unforgettable.
We can never thank her enough

originalText.text:
Nous avions décidé de nous marier à NYC après 19 ans de vie commune. Nous voulions donc un mariage simple, mais magique. En cherchant sur internet, nous avons trouvé le site d' Assetou, et avons demandé un devis. Assetou nous a répondu rapidement et nous avons convenu d'un entretien par skype. Après nous avoir posé toutes les questions, elle nous a envoyé un devis en respectant absolument toutes nos exigences, et notre budget. Elle a été d'une disponibilté incroyable et a respecté à la lettre nos demandes.
Elle a communiqué avec tous les prestataires (que ce soit ses collaborateurs ou l' hôtel et le restaurant que nous avions choisi) de façon très professionnelle.
De ce fait, le jour J, tout s'est déroulé parfaitement. Sa collaboratrice (Anne Brigitte) a été tout aussi professionnelle. Notre célebrante a crée une cérémonie sur mesure. L'équipe de photographe a été à notre écoute et très patiente avec nous.
Nous avons eu notre mariage magique et honnêtement sans Assetou, cela n'aurait pas été possible.
Alors, merci Assetou!!!!!
Myriam et Norberto

text.text:
We decided to get married in NYC after 19 years together. So we wanted a simple, but magical wedding. While searching on the internet, we found the Assetou website, and asked for a quote. Assetou responded to us quickly and we agreed to an interview by Skype. After asking us all the questions, she sent us a quote that absolutely respected all our requirements and our budget. She was incredibly available and respected our requests to the letter.
She communicated with all the service providers (whether her colleagues or the hotel and restaurant we had chosen) in a very professional manner.
As a result, on the big day, everything went perfectly. His collaborator (Anne Brigitte) was just as professional. Our celebrant created a tailor-made ceremony. The photography team listened to us and was very patient with us.
We had our magical wedding and honestly without Assetou it wouldn't have been possible.
So, thank you Assetou!!!!!
Myriam and Norberto
